allowAccessFiles: To save ringtones, please allow the app to access files on your phone.
allowModifySystem: To set ringtones, please allow the app to modify system settings.
watchAd: Watch an ad so you can set your favorite ringtone?
allRightsReserved: All rights reserved to their respective owners, and the application is not responsible for any intellectual property rights violations.
reportCopyright: If you are the owner of an artwork and would like to report a copyright violation, we are happy to receive your report via the email below.
artworkWillBeDeleted: The artwork will be immediately deleted, and we guarantee that it will not be added again to the application.
